blogPost.excerpt: Hijack Your Feed is a Safari extenion that replaces Twitter ads with your todos. It creates eye-catching posts based on your Reminders, which are then hijacked into your Twitter feed. Designed to nudge you toward your intentions… and away from doom-scrolling.
blogPost.body: Hijack Your Feed is a Safari extenion that replaces Twitter ads with your todos. It creates eye-catching posts based on your Reminders, which are then hijacked into your Twitter feed. Designed to nudge you toward your intentions… and away from doom-scrolling.
blogPost.title: Hijack Your Feed - Replace Twitter ads with your todos
blogPost.author: Rodolfo Rosini

localize.description: hijack your Feed是一个Safari扩展，它用你的待办事项取代了Twitter广告。它根据你的提醒创建吸引眼球的帖子，然后这些帖子会被劫持到你的Twitter feed中。旨在将您推向您的意图…远离末日卷轴。
localize.tagline: 用您的待办事项替换Twitter广告

localize.description: hijack your Feed是一個Safari擴展，它用你的待辦事項取代了Twitter廣告。它根據你的提醒創建吸引眼球的帖子，然後這些帖子會被劫持到你的Twitter feed中。旨在將您推向您的意圖…遠離末日卷軸。
localize.tagline: 用您的待辦事項替換Twitter廣告

previous.excerpt: Personal journal app for everyone where you can get connected with others! Goodnight Journal is the only personal journal app that offers modern design that works the same on any device, with the community, chat and features to boost your mental health.
previous.title: Goodnight Journal 2.0 - Facebook for journaling

localize.description: 每个人的个人日记应用程序，在这里您可以与其他人联系！“晚安日记”是唯一一款提供现代设计的个人日记应用程序，它可以在任何设备上工作，具有社区功能、聊天功能和促进心理健康的功能。
每個人的個人日記應用程序，在這裏您可以與其他人聯繫！“晚安日記”是唯一一款提供現代設計的個人日記應用程序，它可以在任何設備上工作，具有社區功能、聊天功能和促進心理健康的功能。

next.excerpt: Startup Job Watch is a weekly updating database of over 6000 jobs from the top startups in the world. These are all companies that were on the best of lists from publications like Business Insider, Linkedin, AngelList, and more!
next.title: Startup Job Watch - Database of 6000+ jobs from the top startups in the world

localize.description: Startup Job Watch是一个每周更新的数据库，其中包含来自世界顶级初创公司的6000多个工作岗位。这些都是来自Business Insider、LinkedIn、AngelList等出版物的最佳公司名单！
localize.tagline: 包含全球顶尖初创企业6000多个职位的数据库

localize.description: Startup Job Watch是一個每週更新的數據庫，其中包含來自世界頂級初創公司的6000多個工作崗位。這些都是來自Business Insider、LinkedIn、AngelList等出版物的最佳公司名單！
localize.tagline: 包含全球頂尖初創企業6000多個職位的數據庫
